The real question is not why is there evil, it is, why is there good?

I drove from Colorado to Michigan over the last three days. Gas prices in Nebraska and Iowa were in the $4.30 range, I think mostly due to the heavy use of ethanol. The highest price was $5.79 in Joliet, IL, which I think is the most I‚Äôve ever paid for a gallon of gas.
